title.rendered: Received a Math Notice from the IRS? Here’s what to do.

content.rendered: The IRS sent out more than 5 million math error notices to individuals, many of them having to do with the economic impact payment issued in 2020 and 2021. Optima CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang help explain what this notice means and provide guidance on what to do if one is received in the mail.
